I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics and Data Science at Carnegie Mellon University. I am advised by Kathryn Roeder and Eugene Katsevich. Previously, I studied math and computer science at the University of Maryland, College Park. Have a look at my blog.

**General interests** High-dimensional statistics, machine learning, statistical genomics

**Current research** Gene transcription, genetic CRISPR screens
